name: Stylish ball
description: In Stylish ball You for a few minutes, hurry up to enjoy the atmosphere of rollicking rock-n-roll, to take a brief course of fighting zombies, and also to remember the school years with drawings in a notebook. This is a fun arkanoid will bring a lot of joy to adults and children. But when combined with a quality soundtrack, it will fall in love with yourself. 's part Stylish ball will make you sweat even the most ardent fans of the classics. You will have an unforgettable adventure in the style of "Arkanoid". After all, classic gameplay, organic music and special attention to the graphics part, are the main components of the success of any game.
